name: Hossein Rahmani 0001
content: Hossein Rahmani - Lancaster University Our use of cookies We use necessary cookies to make our site work. We'd also like to set optional cookies to help us measure web traffic and report on campaigns. We won't set optional cookies unless you enable them. Accept optional cookies Reject optional cookies Cookie settings Professor Hossein Rahmani Professor in Computer Vision and Machine Learning Research Overview Hossein Rahmani received the Ph.D. degree from the University of Western Australia, the MSc degree from Shahid Beheshti University, and the BSc degree from Isfahan University of Technology. His research interests include computer vision and machine learning. His works have been published in premier computer vision journals and conferences, including TPAMI, CVPR, ICCV, and ECCV. He received the Best Scientific Paper Award from the International Conference on Pattern Recognition. He is an Associate Editor of IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems, Pattern recognition, ACM Computing Surveys , and Area Chair of CVPR 2025, CVPR 2024, ICLR 2025, ECCV 2024, IIJCAI 2023 and IJCAI 2024. Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=zFyT_gwAAAAJ&hl=en Personal Webpage: https://sites.google.com/view/rahmaniatlu Show more… PhD Supervision Interests I am always looking for PhD students with a good background in Programming and/or Maths. Please contact me if you are interested in working together on exciting research topics.
